content:
Let me rephrase the response to better fit the conversation flow.

I've been thinking about getting my grandmother's antique jewelry appraised, specifically a diamond necklace from the 1920s. Do you know of any reputable jewelry appraisal services or experts in the field? By the way, I recently sold a rare, limited edition figurine from my favorite childhood cartoon, "Galactic Heroes", to a collector and got a nice profit.
